name: polynote
description: Polynote is a web-based notebook that enables interactive data analytics using spark
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently in preview.
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Polynote is being installed!

	Documentation: https://github.com/dcos/examples/tree/master/zeppelin/1.11
	Issues: https://dcos.io/community or
		 https://github.com/MaibornWolff/dcos-zeppelin
postUninstallNotes: If you installed Polynote with an external persistent volume make sure to delete the volume manually.
